body_html:
@c0710204 When I used your command, I had below errors.
gcc: error: unrecognized command line option '-mavx512f'
gcc: error: unrecognized command line option '-mavx512cd'
gcc: error: unrecognized command line option '-mavx512er'
gcc: error: unrecognized command line option '-mavx512pf'

I think this error related with Tensorflow , OS and GCC version, but I don't know what is the best combination. Please tell me about that.
( I have executed tensorflow 0.12.0 version with CentOS 7.2 and GCC 4.8.5)

Thank you.

body:
@c0710204 When I used your command, I had below errors.
`gcc: error: unrecognized command line option '-mavx512f'`
`gcc: error: unrecognized command line option '-mavx512cd'`
`gcc: error: unrecognized command line option '-mavx512er'`
`gcc: error: unrecognized command line option '-mavx512pf'`

I think this error related with Tensorflow , OS and GCC version, but I don't know what is the best combination. Please tell me about that.
( I have executed tensorflow 0.12.0 version with CentOS 7.2 and GCC 4.8.5)

Thank you.
